trans-unit.source: Provides metadata for a property representing a data field.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder metadata for en egenskap som representerer et datafelt.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataObjectFieldAttribute attribute to provide information about the schema of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Bruk attributtet DataObjectFieldAttribute til å angi informasjon om skjemaet av de underliggende dataene.

trans-unit.source: Design-time classes such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to set properties at design-time based on the exposed schema.
trans-unit.target: Utformingen klasser som den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>klasse bruk av <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>attributtet til å angi egenskaper på utformingstidspunktet basert på eksponerte skjema.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You apply the DataObjectFieldAttribute attribute to members of the data item objects that are returned by the Select method of an object marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke DataObjectFieldAttribute-attributtet for medlemmer av elementet dataobjekter som returneres av Select-metoden til et objekt som er merket med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>attributtet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `NorthwindData` class is marked with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute, and returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object containing `NorthwindEmployee` objects from the `GetAllEmployees` method.
trans-unit.target: I eksemplet nedenfor i `NorthwindData` klasse er merket med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>attributtet, og returnerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objektet som inneholder `NorthwindEmployee` objekter fra den `GetAllEmployees` metoden.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Fields in the `NorthwindEmployee` class are marked with the DataObjectFieldAttribute attribute to indicate they represent data fields in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Felt i den `NorthwindEmployee` klassen er merket med attributtet DataObjectFieldAttribute til å angi de representerer datafelt i den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker attributter [attributter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"></xref> class and indicates whether the field is the primary key for the data row.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"> </xref> klasse og angir om feltet er primærnøkkelen for dataraden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field is in the primary key of the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>som viser at feltet i primærnøkkelen for dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"></xref> class and indicates whether the field is the primary key for the data row, and whether the field is a database identity field.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"> </xref> klasse og angir om feltet er primærnøkkelen for dataraden, og om feltet et database-ID-felt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field is in the primary key of the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>som viser at feltet i primærnøkkelen for dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field is an identity field that uniquely identifies the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at feltet er et ID-felt identifiserer som dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"></xref> class and indicates whether the field is the primary key for the data row, whether the field is a database identity field, and whether the field can be null.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"> </xref> klasse og angir om feltet er primærnøkkelen for dataraden om feltet er en database-ID-felt og om feltet kan være null.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field is in the primary key of the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>som viser at feltet i primærnøkkelen for dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field is an identity field that uniquely identifies the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at feltet er et ID-felt identifiserer som dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field can be null in the data store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at feltet kan være null i datalageret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"></xref> class and indicates whether the field is the primary key for the data row, whether it is a database identity field, and whether it can be null and sets the length of the field.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"> </xref> klasse angir om feltet er primærnøkkelen for dataraden om det er en database-ID-felt og om den kan være null og angir lengden på feltet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field is in the primary key of the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>som viser at feltet i primærnøkkelen for dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field is an identity field that uniquely identifies the data row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at feltet er et ID-felt identifiserer som dataraden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the field can be null in the data store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at feltet kan være null i datalageret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The length of the field in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på feltet i byte.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om denne forekomsten er lik det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether this instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute> fits the pattern of another object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bestemmer om denne forekomsten av <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>passer mønsteret for et annet objekt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som skal sammenlignes med denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the obj parameter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne forekomsten er lik den angitte av forekomsten av obj parameteren; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: En 32-biters heltall med fortegn hash-kode.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a property represents an identity field in the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en egenskap representerer et ID-felt i de underliggende dataene.

trans-unit.source: Set the IsIdentity property to `true` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute> attribute is applied to a property that represents an identity field in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen IsIdentity `true` når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>attributtet brukes til en egenskap som representerer et ID-felt i det underliggende datalageret.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Typically an identity field is generated by the data store and uniquely identifies an entity in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis en ID-felt som genereres av datalageret og identifiserer en enhet i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Set the IsIdentity property with one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen IsIdentity med én av de <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>konstruktører.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property represents an identity field in the underlying data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapen representerer en ID-feltet i de underliggende dataene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a property represents a field that can be null in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en egenskap representerer et felt som kan være null i den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Set the IsNullable property to `true` when then <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute> attribute is applied to a property that represents a field in the underlying data store that can be set to null.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen IsNullable `true` når deretter <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>attributtet brukes til en egenskap som representerer et felt i det underliggende datalageret som kan angis til null.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The value that represents null in the data store may be different from `null` in the programming language.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som representerer null i datalageret kan være forskjellig fra `null` i programmeringsspråket.

trans-unit.source: Set the IsNullable property with one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen IsNullable med én av de <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>konstruktører.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property represents a field that can be null in the underlying data store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapen representerer et felt som kan være null i det underliggende datalageret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the property in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden på egenskapen i byte.

trans-unit.source: Set the Length property to the length, in bytes, of the data from the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen lengde til lengden av data fra den underliggende datakilden, i byte.

trans-unit.source: If the Length property is not set, it will be -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen lengden ikke er angitt, vil det være -1.

trans-unit.source: Set the Length property with one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen lengden med én av de <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>konstruktører.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The length of the property in bytes, or -1 if not set.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på egenskapen i byte eller -1 hvis angitt ikke.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a property is in the primary key in the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om det er en egenskap i primærnøkkelen i de underliggende dataene.

trans-unit.source: Set the PrimaryKey property to `true` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute> attribute is applied to a property that represents the primary key value of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen PrimaryKey `true` når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>attributtet brukes til en egenskap som representerer primærnøkkelverdi av de underliggende dataene.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The primary key is typically used by the underlying data store to uniquely identify an entity in the data store, and often is, but is not required to be, a data store identity field.
trans-unit.target: Primærnøkkelen brukes vanligvis av den underliggende datakilden til å identifisere en enhet i datakilden, og ofte er, men er ikke påkrevd, et datafelt for store identitet.

trans-unit.source: Set the PrimaryKey property with one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen PrimaryKey med én av de <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>konstruktører.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectFieldAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is in the primary key of the data store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapen i primærnøkkelen for datalageret; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
